theBrewmaster:BeerSteinRelic.NAME: Beer Stein
theBrewmaster:BeerSteinRelic.FLAVOR: I've never heard of one drinks too many.
DESCRIPTIONS: Keep up to #b50 #yIntoxication between floors and acts.

theBrewmaster:GiantKegRelic.NAME: Bottomless Stein
theBrewmaster:GiantKegRelic.FLAVOR: I've had one drinks too many.
DESCRIPTIONS: Keep up to #b200 #yIntoxication between floors and acts.

theBrewmaster:SpiritHelmetRelic.NAME: Spirit Helmet
theBrewmaster:SpiritHelmetRelic.FLAVOR: I've never heard of one drinks too many.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you would gain #yIntoxication, gain 150% that amount instead.

theBrewmaster:LouseLiverRelic.NAME: Louse Liver
theBrewmaster:LouseLiverRelic.FLAVOR: It's really just a bunch of them stuck together.
DESCRIPTIONS: You become Intoxicated at #b75 #yIntoxication instead of #b100.

theBrewmaster:CozyBeerRelic.NAME: Cozy Beer
theBrewmaster:CozyBeerRelic.FLAVOR: A little buddy to help lighten the load.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can Relax at Rest Sites. Starting your next combat with an additional 50 #yIntoxication.

theBrewmaster:EthanolFlaskRelic.NAME: Ethanol Flask
theBrewmaster:EthanolFlaskRelic.FLAVOR: A lot of bad people made a lot of good money with this stuff.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #yDrenched take an additional 10% more damage from attacks per stack.

theBrewmaster:OctarineCupRelic.NAME: Octarine Cup
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yIntoxication for the first time each combat, gain [E]

theBrewmaster:MiniFridgeRelic.NAME: Mini Fridge
theBrewmaster:MiniFridgeRelic.FLAVOR: The Merchant will settle your bill at the end of your time in the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: 25% of the time, when you play a Brew card, create a random 0-cost Brew card with Exhaust in your hand.
